== Introduction ==
In <nowiki>[[ItalianCD|this]]</nowiki> page the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-it|Italian LoCo Team]]</nowiki> will collect all the informations in English about the release of the Italian localized Iso. We're going to release the Ubuntu 12.04 Desktop image in both i386 and amd64 architecture.
